name: Sony Video Analysis File
summary: Learn about .MODD files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: The data stored in MODD files is used by the Video Analysis feature within Sony Picture Motion Browser.

description: Information file that stores metadata about a video clip recorded with a Sony camcorder; saved along with a high definition .M2TS or .MTS file or a standard definition .MPG file; may include date and time information and other relevant data.
